item.title: Project 1: Title Management Sheet (Simon & Schuster)
item.description: Project 1: Title Management Sheet (Simon & Schuster) Overview Redesigned multi-sheet Google Sheets workbook used for tracking book production. Cleaned, reformatted, and migrated data. Added conditional formatting, data validation, and filter views. Created documentation and distributed to colleagues. Click here to view the workbook. Documentation Expand/Contract Views You can now click the +/- symbols along the grey edge of the spreadsheet to expand or contract your view. Because this is a shared document, this will change the view for everyone trying to view the document, so use sparingly.
